CompartmentPackage

Class AxonHillock

  • java.lang.Object
    • CompartmentPackage.AbstractCompartment
      • CompartmentPackage.AbstractSpikingCompartment
        • CompartmentPackage.AxonHillock

  • public class AxonHillock
extends AbstractSpikingCompartment
    Author:
    lss spiking compartment intended for pyramidal neurons does not currently use any synapses, but these can be created (using the code in AbstractCompartment) and implemented in runAndSpike
